content.webTitle: The Beatles have LSD explained to them by Peter Fonda

fields.headline: The Beatles have LSD explained to them by Peter Fonda
fields.bodyText: There were psychedelic records before the Beatles made Revolver, but it took the Beatles to make psychedelia part of the mainstream. John Lennon's curiosity about LSD was piqued by a party at the Playboy Mansion when actor Peter Fonda tried to describe the drug's effects. "I know what it's like to be dead," he said to George Harrison. "You're making me feel like I've never been born," interjected Lennon. The encounter formed the basis of She Said, She Said, one of the band's first experiments with the new form.
